channel.title: BBC News | News Front Page | UK Edition
channel.description: Visit BBC News for up-to-the-minute news, breaking news, video, audio and feature stories. BBC News provides trusted World and UK news as well as local and regional perspectives. Also entertainment, business, science, technology and health news.

item.title: Policewoman shot during burglary
item.description: A 25-year-old female Pc is in a serious condition after being shot as she attended a burglary in Nottingham.

item.title: Lebanon marks Hariri anniversary
item.description: Thousands of people gather in Beirut to mark one year since the assassination of ex-Prime Minister Rafik Hariri.

item.title: MPs to vote on full smoking ban
item.description: MPs are to vote on whether to impose a total ban on smoking in pubs and clubs across England.
